00023 #include <stdio.h>
00024 #include <stdlib.h>
00025 #include <avr/io.h>
00026 
00027 #include "board.h"
00028 #include "rotary_encoder.h"
00029 
00031 unsigned char encoder_last_state = 0;
00032 
00034 unsigned char encoder_current_state = 0;
00035 
00038 unsigned char poll_encoder_state(void) {
00039         return(((PINE & (1<<PULSE_SENSOR_BIT1))>>PULSE_SENSOR_BIT1) | ((PINE & (1<<PULSE_SENSOR_BIT2))>>(PULSE_SENSOR_BIT2-1)));
00040 }
00041 
00044 int rotary_encoder_poll(void) {
00045         int retval = 0;
00046         encoder_current_state = poll_encoder_state();
00047 
00048         if (encoder_current_state != encoder_last_state) {
00049                 if (((encoder_current_state == 3) && (encoder_last_state == 2)) || ((encoder_current_state == 0) && (encoder_last_state == 1)))
00050                         retval = 1;
00051                 else if (((encoder_current_state == 3) && (encoder_last_state == 1)) || ((encoder_current_state == 0) && (encoder_last_state == 2)))
00052                         retval = -1;
00053 
00054                 encoder_last_state = encoder_current_state;
00055         }
00056 
00057         return(retval);
00058 }
